channel.title: Comments on: Does The IMG Tag Need A Fullsize Attribute?

item.title: By: ViemViaplymew
item.dc:creator: ViemViaplymew
item.description: heel Lifts do appear to be mirroring Apple's success although, sales have rocketed along with a quick glance at Goggle's search results show that there's a rigorous and competitive aura surrounding the soon to become infamous height increase item, Steve Jobs would be impressed there isn't any doubt shoe lifts
item.content:encoded:
heel Lifts do appear to be mirroring Apple’s success although, sales have rocketed along with a quick glance at Goggle’s search results show that there’s a rigorous and competitive aura surrounding the soon to become infamous height increase item, Steve Jobs would be impressed there isn’t any doubt
shoe lifts

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Yea I was trying to work on a reference to "Better Tools Please" http://www.mazelife.com/blog/read/better-tools-please/ but I just couldn't fit it in.
item.content:encoded: Yea I was trying to work on a reference to “Better Tools Please” http://www.mazelife.com/blog/r.....ls-please/ but I just couldn’t fit it in.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I actually meant wary though I was in a weary state when writing this last night. http://jdnnj.livejournal.com/56894.html
item.content:encoded: I actually meant wary though I was in a weary state when writing this last night. http://jdnnj.livejournal.com/56894.html

item.title: By: Brian Bailey
item.dc:creator: Brian Bailey
item.description: Good post. Reminds me of James' Mazelife post about using decades-old languages to solve today's problems and to design today's sites.
item.content:encoded: Good post. Reminds me of James’ Mazelife post about using decades-old languages to solve today’s problems and to design today’s sites.

item.title: By: L.T.
item.dc:creator: L.T.
item.description: "What I’m weary about..." -- Are you really tired? Or did you mean "what I'm leery of..."?
item.content:encoded:
“What I’m weary about…” — Are you really tired?
Or did you mean “what I’m leery of…”?
